More Jason Preston NBA Stats »

NBA Transactions

Jul 29, 2021 - The Orlando Magic selected Jason Preston in Round 2 with Pick 3 in the 2021 NBA Draft. Jul 29, 2021 - The draft rights to Jason Preston was acquired by the Los Angeles Clippers from the Orlando Magic in exchange for a 2026 2nd round pick (DET own) and cash. Aug 9, 2021 - Jason Preston signed a multi-year contract with the Los Angeles Clippers. Oct 31, 2022 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Nov 6, 2022 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Nov 7, 2022 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Nov 16, 2022 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Nov 17, 2022 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Nov 28, 2022 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Dec 4, 2022 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Dec 8, 2022 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Dec 12, 2022 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Dec 15, 2022 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Dec 18, 2022 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Jan 5, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Jan 9, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Jan 10, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Jan 11, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Jan 14, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Jan 16, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Jan 17, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Jan 20, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Jan 22, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Jan 23, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Jan 26, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Feb 12, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Feb 14, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Feb 22, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers assigned Jason Preston to the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Mar 23, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers recalled Jason Preston from the Ontario Clippers of the G League. Oct 1, 2023 - The Los Angeles Clippers placed the contract of Jason Preston on waivers. Oct 3, 2023 - Jason Preston, previously with the Los Angeles Clippers, became a free agent. Oct 16, 2023 - Jason Preston signed a contract with the Memphis Grizzlies. Oct 18, 2023 - The Memphis Grizzlies placed the contract of Jason Preston on waivers. Oct 20, 2023 - Jason Preston, previously with the Memphis Grizzlies, became a free agent. Jan 8, 2024 - Jason Preston signed a two-way contract with the Utah Jazz.
